data.value: Something went wrong. Make your suggestion again.

data.comment: Success message on successfully adding new suggestion in company responses.

data.comment: Success message on successfully adding user response in my responses.

data.comment: Show error message while approving the suggested response if any field is empty.

data.name: WelcomeCardChatRequestorContentText
data.comment: Welcome card content text10.

data.name: WelcomeCardContent
data.value: Click the small version of my icon near your message formatting options to get started.
data.comment: Welcome card content text.

data.name: WelcomeCardLabelContentText
data.value: - Edit response response before final submission.
data.comment: Welcome card content text9.

data.name: WelcomeCardResponseListContentText
data.comment: Welcome card content text2.

data.name: WelcomeCardSuggestedContentText
data.value: - Suggest new responses to use across company and check your request status.
data.comment: Welcome card content text7.

data.name: WelcomeCardSuggestResponseContentText
data.value: - Suggest new response to add in company responses.
data.comment: Welcome card content text4.

data.name: WelcomeCardThingsContentText
data.value: Here are some of the things that I can do:
data.comment: Welcome card content text1.

data.name: WelcomeCardTitle
data.value: Welcome! Hello, I can help you to manage your quick responses to search and share in chat messages.
data.comment: Welcome card title text.

data.name: ForbiddenErrorMessage
data.value: You cannot access this page. Contact your IT admin for permission.
data.comment: Forbidden http status code.

data.name: GeneralErrorMessage
data.value: Something went wrong. Try again in a few minutes.
data.comment: General error message to be shown in client app.

data.name: RefreshLinkText
data.comment: Refresh link text for error page in client app.

data.name: UnauthorizedErrorMessage
data.value: Something went wrong. Try again in a few minutes.
data.comment: Http status code 404

data.name: UserCustomMessage
data.value: Hello, I don't support bot commands.
data.comment: When user asks bot a questions- a message appears saying that bot command is not supported in personal scope.

data.name: ErrorWhenMessageInChannel
data.value: App does not support any bot commands, please use messaging extension for better results.
data.comment: Error message when Admin messages in channel.

data.name: WelcomeCardContentForAdmin
data.value: Hello, I can assist you in managing user submitted responses.
data.comment: Welcome card content text for admin.

data.name: ApprovedRequestStatusText
data.comment: Show status as approved for approved response request to user.

data.name: RejectedRequestStatusText
data.comment: Show status as Rejected for Rejected response request to user.

data.name: MaxCompanyResponseMessage
data.value: Max limit reached for approved company responses. Please contact your admin to get more details.
data.comment: Max responses message to be displayed in client app.
